title: PR Workshop for Cardano Projects by professional PR agency
summary: Cardano projects often struggle with public relations; many lack the skills to effectively market themselves, limiting their visibility and growth.
solution: Yellow House GmbH will host a free PR workshop to empower Cardano projects with the skills needed to enhance their media presence and market effectively.
proposer_relevant_experience:
Chris Flato: Chris breaths esports and gaming every day. He once managed Communications for ESL, the world's largest esports company, and his extensive network is matched only by his confidence in his gaming skills. He is doing what a CEO does, attending all possible conferences and making sure everybody is paid at the end of the month.



Nils Lassen: Nils brings years of PR and communications experience within and outside the gaming and esports ecosystem to our yellow house. As an all-rounder, he leads the operational business and supports our clients like a loyal husband in good times and bad. So, as a wise woman once said: “If you liked it then you shoulda put a ring on it”.

sub_fields.title: Category Questions
sub_fields.description: Answer the following questions to determine the eligibility of your proposal.

sub_fields.title: Who you’re targeting, how you’ll reach them, and why this matters for Cardano?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer: We are targeting Cardano projects who want to receive help & support in their marketing, specifically PR efforts. We know most Cardano projects are not at the size where they can actually hire PR experts, so we hope to give them a good boost even without the additional cost.

sub_fields.title: Provide a list of key activities of your project:
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
Pre and Post-Workshop Surveys: To measure the increase in PR knowledge and confidence among participants.

Follow-Up Interviews: Conducting interviews with participants to document how they applied what they learned.

Case Studies: Highlighting specific successes where projects increased their visibility using strategies from the workshop.

Engagement Metrics: Tracking social media and website analytics before and after the workshop to see tangible improvements.



Our workshop is uniquely designed for the Cardano ecosystem, focusing on the specific challenges and opportunities within this blockchain environment. The participants will benefit from Yellow House GmbH's decade of experience in PR, gaining insights that are directly applicable and immediately beneficial.

sub_fields.title: What are your success metrics?
sub_fields.description: Please provide your rationale.
sub_fields.answer:
We will measure the impact by:



Knowledge Gain: Assessing the increase in PR knowledge through pre and post-workshop assessments.

Application of Skills: Monitoring how participants apply skills over the months following the workshop.

Visibility and Engagement: Measuring the media coverage and social media improvements of participating projects.

sub_fields.title: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.description: Please describe your proposed solution and how it addresses the problem
sub_fields.answer:
Many emerging projects on the Cardano blockchain have groundbreaking ideas but fail to communicate their value effectively to a broader audience. Without strong public relations and marketing skills, these projects cannot attract the attention they need to grow, find investors, or engage users. This lack of visibility is a significant barrier to success and adoption within the vibrant Cardano ecosystem.



Yellow House GmbH believes that by equipping these projects with essential PR skills and knowledge, we can enable them to tell their stories compellingly. This empowerment will lead to increased visibility, attracting more support and recognition from the broader blockchain community. A workshop format is ideal because it allows for interactive, hands-on learning and direct feedback, making it more impactful than one-way communication methods.



This PR workshop will engage:



Cardano Project Leaders and Teams: To learn about effective PR strategies and apply them to their projects.

Marketing and Communication Professionals: To share insights and best practices in blockchain PR.

Media Representatives: To discuss what they look for in stories and how projects can better interact with the press.

Community Managers and Social Media Coordinators: To understand how to use digital platforms for better project storytelling.

The impact of the workshop will be demonstrated through:



Pre and Post-Workshop Surveys: To measure the increase in PR knowledge and confidence among participants.

Follow-Up Interviews: Conducting interviews with participants to document how they applied what they learned.

Case Studies: Highlighting specific successes where projects increased their visibility using strategies from the workshop.

Engagement Metrics: Tracking social media and website analytics before and after the workshop to see tangible improvements.

Our workshop is uniquely designed for the Cardano ecosystem, focusing on the specific challenges and opportunities within this blockchain environment. The participants will benefit from Yellow House GmbH's decade of experience in PR, gaining insights that are directly applicable and immediately beneficial.



This initiative is crucial for Cardano because improving the PR capabilities of its projects will lead to a more vibrant, dynamic, and successful ecosystem, attracting more users, developers, and investors.

sub_fields.title: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.description: Please define the positive impact your project will have on the wider Cardano community
sub_fields.answer:
This project offers excellent value for money by:



Directly Empowering the Community: The workshop builds capacity within the Cardano ecosystem, enabling projects to be more successful and self-sufficient.

Creating Long-Term Value: Skills and knowledge gained from the workshop will continue to benefit the projects long after the workshop ends.

Leveraging Expertise Efficiently: Using Yellow House GmbH's expertise ensures that the resources are used effectively to achieve significant improvements in PR for Cardano projects.

This proposal aims to significantly enhance the PR capabilities of projects within the Cardano ecosystem, ensuring they have the skills necessary to thrive and contribute to a more vibrant and successful Cardano community.

sub_fields.title: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.description: What is your capability to deliver your project with high levels of trust and accountability? How do you intend to validate if your approach is feasible?
sub_fields.answer:
Yellow House GmbH is a professional PR and communications agency with:



Expert Knowledge: Specialized in digital cultures and blockchain technology.

Proven Track Record: Successful in elevating the profiles of numerous tech and digital projects.

Dedicated Team: Experienced in conducting workshops and training sessions that empower participants with practical skills.

The approach's feasibility will be validated through:



Pilot Workshops: Conducting initial small-scale workshops to refine the curriculum based on feedback.

Collaborative Planning: Working with Cardano community leaders to ensure the workshop meets the needs of the participants.

Feedback Loops: Incorporating participant feedback to continually improve the workshop's content and delivery.

sub_fields.title: Project Milestones
sub_fields.description: What are the key milestones you need to achieve in order to complete your project successfully?

sub_fields.title: What are the key milestones you need to achieve in order to complete your project successfully?
sub_fields.description: The number of milestones required depends on the amount of funding requested. Please refer to the Guidance card on the right for details

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Workshop Development and Participant Enrollment

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Develop and finalize a comprehensive workshop curriculum that outlines all planned modules, learning objectives, hands-on activities, and support materials. Begin outreach efforts to promote the workshop to relevant Cardano project teams and community members, open the enrollment process, and complete participant registration. This includes managing inquiries, confirming eligibility, and ensuring that all selected participants have the necessary information prior to the workshop date.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer: The full workshop curriculum must be completed, reviewed, and approved internally. All instructional materials should be ready for delivery, including slides, worksheets, and reference guides. The participant list should be finalized with confirmed registrations, ensuring a diverse and representative group of attendees from various Cardano projects. All logistical requirements for participants—such as schedules, expectations, and preparatory instructions - should be communicated clearly.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: A finalized workshop curriculum document, including agendas and learning materials, and a complete set of participant registration forms or digital confirmations. Additional evidence may include enrollment records, outreach summaries, and communication logs with participants.

sub_fields.description: The month when this milestone will be delivered

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Conduct the PR Workshop

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Successfully deliver the full-day PR workshop designed specifically for Cardano projects. This includes facilitating interactive discussions, presenting educational modules, conducting practical exercises, and providing real-time guidance tailored to participants' communication needs. The workshop should create an engaging and collaborative environment that maximizes learning and participation.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer: The workshop must be delivered according to the finalized curriculum, maintaining a high standard of educational quality and participant engagement. Attendees should actively participate in activities, ask questions, and demonstrate an understanding of the PR concepts being taught. The facilitator should receive positive verbal feedback, and the workshop should run smoothly from start to finish with minimal disruptions.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: A full set of workshop presentation slides, participant attendance records, and photos or screenshots capturing moments of engagement and interaction during the event. Additional evidence may include facilitator notes, participant feedback forms, and summaries of workshop discussions.

sub_fields.title: Milestone Title
sub_fields.description: A clear, concise title for this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Post-Workshop Support and Impact Assessment

sub_fields.title: Milestone Outputs
sub_fields.description: What will be delivered in this milestone
sub_fields.answer: Provide personalized follow-up support to participants after the workshop, which may include reviewing drafted PR materials, offering strategic guidance, hosting optional check-in meetings, or giving individualized recommendations. Conduct an impact assessment to evaluate how participants are applying the workshop content to improve their PR practices, communication strategies, and project visibility.

sub_fields.title: Acceptance Criteria
sub_fields.description: Specific conditions that must be met
sub_fields.answer: Participants demonstrate measurable improvements in their PR activities, such as enhanced clarity in messaging, more consistent communication efforts, improved outreach results, or better engagement with their target audiences. These improvements must be documented through qualitative or quantitative assessment methods.

sub_fields.title: Evidence of Completion
sub_fields.description: How you will demonstrate achievement
sub_fields.answer: Documentation summarizing all follow-up support provided, including communication records, feedback notes, or advisory materials; a comprehensive impact assessment report detailing observed outcomes, participant progress, and overall effectiveness of the workshop.

sub_fields.answer:
Cost Breakdown



Workshop Development: 20,000 for research, curriculum development, and material preparation.

Participant Support: 20,000 for providing materials and support to participants.

Marketing and Outreach: 10,000 for promoting the workshop within the Cardano community.

Post-Workshop Support and Impact Assessment: 10,000 for follow-up support and documentation.
